name: Projection Jump
description:
I wanted to try and make a game in (a little bit less than) a month, and here it is!!

In this short game you can move on some walls, use shadows as platforms and even move the sun. It has 8 small levels so you can try the main mechanic and completely understand it.

Please, don't be afraid to leave some feedback with ideas for a possible sequel (I had some that were taken out bc of time) or as improvements in design and other areas

Thanks for giving it a chance!!

Special thanks

VOiD1 Gaming for the music
